mapper.insert: insert into sys_power (power_name, power_code, enable) values (#{powerName}, #{powerCode}, #{enable})
mapper.select: select power_id, power_name, power_code, enable, create_time, update_time from sys_power where power_id = #{powerId} limit 1
select * from sys_power where concat(ifnull(power_name, ''), ifnull(power_code, '')) like concat('%', ifnull(#{powerName}, ''), '%', ifnull(#{powerCode}, ''), '%')
select sp.* from sys_power sp left join sys_role_power srp on sp.power_id = srp.power_id left join sys_role sr on srp.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_id = #{roleId}
select sp.* from sys_power sp left join sys_role_power srp on sp.power_id = srp.power_id left join sys_role sr on srp.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_name = #{roleName}
